title: The Milkman (2008) DIVX 1080p Direct
description:
This short film shot on Super 16mm (15 minutes) was released in 2008. Due to SAG student contracts it cannot be distributed on DVD without paying a good sum of money back to SAG. 

This is a perfect quality DIVX encode from the D-5 1080p master. 

If oyu like the film, please rate it at the IMDB link below!
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1183485/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1183485/</a>
 

About the film - It is based on the true story of the filmmaker\&#039;s relative who was a milkman in the 1950\&#039;s by day, and a hitman for the teamsters by night. 



www.milkmanthefilm.com
